text: Melody Gardot (born 2 February 1985) is a Grammy-nominated American musician. She has been influenced by other blues and jazz musicians, such as Judy Garland, Janis Joplin and Duke Ellington. She sings jazz music. Gardot was born in New Jersey. She follows the teachings of Buddhism. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official site Category:American jazz musicians Category:Musicians from New Jersey Category:1985 births Category:Living people
title: Melody Gardot
